Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: KananjaloukubabeSithandabeSingabavezakuwe, yayeubuza kubazi ngophawu lwabo; kodwa uza kubazi ngemvakalo zwi yentetho yabo. Kwaye uAllâh uyazazi izenzo zenu
Ke kaloku Siya kunivavanya de bacace abo bazabalazela (iNdlela ka-Allâh) phakathi kwenu nabanomonde, yaye Siya kuyicikida imibandela yenu

Inene abo bangakholwayo, bathintela (abanye) eNdleleni ka- Allâh, baphikise uMthunywa (uMuhammad) emva kokuba isikhokelo sicacile kubo asokuze bamonzakalise uAllâh, kwaye Yena Uya kusuka Enze izenzo zabo zibe yinto engento
Hini na nina bakholwayo, thobelani uAllâh, nithobele uMthunywa ningatshitshisi izenzo zenu (ngokungamthobeli)
Inene abo bangakholwayo, bathintela abanye eNdleleni ka- Allâh baze bafe besengabangakholwayo Akasokuze abaxolele uAllâh
Ngoko ke ningatyhafi nicele ukuba makube luxolo (imfazwe iphele) lo gama inini abangentla; kwaye uAllâh Ukunye nani Engasokuze Anibandezele umvuzo wezenzo zenu
Ubomi beli hlabathi lulonwabo (lobuxoki) yaye buya phambukisa. Kanti ke ukuba niyakholwa, noyike uAllâh, Yena Uya kuninika imivuzo yenu yaye Akayi kucela izinto zenu
Ukanti ukuba Ebenokuzicela kuni, beniya kuzinkonya, yaye Ebeza kuyiveza elubala inkcaso yenu

Aphakeninaningabobamenyelwaukubabanikele(ngamalizo) eNdleleni ka-Allâh kodwa phakathi kwenu kukho abo banobugqolo. Nabani na ke onobugqolo (abanjalo) banjalo ngokuchasene neziqu zabo. Yena uAllâh Akadingi nto ukanti nini abadingayo. Ke kaloku ukuba nithe natyibilika narhoxa eNdleleni, Yena Uya kwenza abanye abantu endaweni yenu bona ke abayi kuba njengani
